summary.para: Performs a natural log-of-softmax activation function on each element of InputTensor, placing the result into the corresponding element of OutputTensor.
summary.code: // Let x_i be the current value in the axis, and j be the total number of elements along that axis. f(x_i) = ln(exp(x_i) / sum(exp(x_0), ..., exp(x_j)))
summary.para: Where exp(x) is the natural exponentiation function, and ln(x) is the natural logarithm.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_LOG_SOFTMAX_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The input tensor to read from. This tensor must have an effective rank no greater than 2. The effective rank of a tensor is the DimensionCount of the tensor, excluding leftmost dimensions of size 1. For example a tensor size of { 1, 1, BatchCount, Width } is valid, and is equivalent to a tensor of sizes { BatchCount, Width }.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_LOG_SOFTMAX_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The output tensor to write the results to.
